sn56.6:1.3: or present—reveal that they are awakened, all of them reveal that they truly awakened to the four noble truths.
sn56.6:2.2: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering. …
sn56.6:3.1: That’s why you should practice meditation …”
